properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,   
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 b.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs, 
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num, 
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA     
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE()  - 100) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) AND
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS 
								WHERE ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
										( 8=8 ) AND 
										( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) ) 
 -------------- OK  2
UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
		   ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,
  0.00 AS VL_DESCONTOS,
  0.00 AS VL_JUROS, 
  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART INOB' AS BASE,
    GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,

		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,

		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL

        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND

		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,

  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART IOF' AS BASE,
    GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itabuna' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,

         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,

         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,

         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num,

		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND

		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND

		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND

		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND

								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itaigara' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Itaigara' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_ir,   
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,

         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,

		 mns.mns_mns_serie,

		 mns.mns_num,

		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,

		 emp.emp_cgc

        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO,

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT  
       mns.mns_serie as serie, 
       mns.mns_num as numero, 
       mns.mns_nfs_serie as nfs_serie,
       mns.mns_nfs_numero as nfs_numero,
       mns.mns_nfs_tipo as nfs_tipo,    
       (SELECT sum ( m2.mns_vlr ) 
        	FROM mns m2, nfs 
			WHERE  ( m2.mns_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND 
					( m2.mns_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
               ( m2.mns_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
               ( m2.mns_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo )) AS imposto
			FROM   cnv, 
					 emp, 
					 nfs, 
					 cfg, 
					 mns 
			 WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
				( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
				( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
				( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100) AND  
				( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
				( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
				( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
				( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
				( 8=8 ) AND 
				NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
									WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
											( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
											( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
			GROUP  BY   mns.mns_serie , 
					 mns.mns_num , 
					 mns.mns_nfs_serie ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_numero ,
					 mns.mns_nfs_tipo  

) m ON m.serie = mns.mns_serie and m.numero = mns.mns_num and m.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie and m.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero and m.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) 
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,   
         cnv.cnv_nome,   
         emp.emp_nome_fantasia,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_codigo,   
         nfs.nfs_emp_cod,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,   
         cfg.cfg_emp,   
         cnv.cnv_ccr_banco,    
         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,   
         cfg.cfg_tol_ent_diaria,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_juro,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp,   
         MNS.MNS_DT,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num, 
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme, 
		 nfs.nfs_nde_tipo, 
		 nfs.nfs_vlr_ir, 
		 mns.mns_obs,
		 nfs.nfs_ind_tipo_fatura,
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_nfl_num,
		 mns.mns_nfl_serie,
		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc 

UNION ALL   

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,

        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,

		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
    FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS, 
			nfs b  
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
			( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_SERIE = b.nfs_ns_serie ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_NUMERO = b.nfs_ns_numero ) and  
         ( nfs.NFS_TIPO = b.nfs_ns_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
			( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
			( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			( 8=8 ) AND 	
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) )
GROUP BY nfs.nfs_tipo,   
         nfs.nfs_serie,   
         nfs.nfs_numero,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_emis,   
         nfs.nfs_dt_vcto,   
         nfs.nfs_valor,   
         nfs.nfs_vlr_multa,

         nfs.nfs_vlr_iss,

         cfg.cfg_vlrfilme,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_iss,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_ir,   
         nfs.nfs_perc_multa,   
         nfs.nfs_remessa,

         CASE WHEN mns.mns_tipo = 'NR' THEN b.nfs_dt_vcto ELSE MNS.MNS_DT END,   
         MNS.MNS_TIPO, 
		 MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO, 
		 mns.mns_mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_mns_num, 
		 mns.mns_serie, 
		 mns.mns_num,

		 mns.mns_nfl_num,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_receb,
		 nfs.nfs_dt_envio,
		 nfs.nfs_ns_serie, 
		 nfs.nfs_ns_numero, 	
		 cnv.cnv_caixa_fatura,
         cfg.cfg_cgc,
		 emp.emp_cgc

UNION ALL

    FROM cnv,   
         emp,

   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and

			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select '' nr_tipo_titulo,
obter_cgc_estabelecimento(R.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO) AS CNPJ, 
'' AS NR_SERIE_TITULO,
l.nr_titulo, 
l.dt_recebimento, 
l.vl_recebido, 
l.vl_descontos, 
l.vl_juros, 
l.vl_multa, 
l.dt_atualizacao, 
t.ds_tipo_recebimento,
x.DS_TRANSACAO,
'TASY Delphi' AS BASE,
 SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
from titulo_receber r,
     TITULO_RECEBER_LIQ L,
     tipo_recebimento t,
     TRANSACAO_FINANCEIRA X
where r.nr_titulo = l.nr_titulo 
and l.cd_tipo_recebimento = t.cd_tipo_recebimento
AND l.nr_seq_trans_fin = X.NR_SEQUENCIA

SELECT  
        a.ie_tipo_titulo as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
        '' as NR_SERIE_TITULO,
        A.NR_TITULO,
        A.DT_EMISSAO as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,
        A.DT_VENCIMENTO DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,
        A.VL_TITULO VL_TITULO,
        A.VL_MULTA_FIXO AS VL_MULTA,
        C.DS_CONVENIO,
        B.DS_RAZAO_SOCIAL as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,
        B.CD_CGC AS CONV_CNPJ,
        0 AS VL_ISS,
        0 AS VL_IR,
        0 AS VL_FILME,
        0 AS VL_PERC_ISS,
        0 AS VL_PER_IR,
        A.TX_MULTA AS VL_PERC_MULTA,
        A.TX_JUROS AS VL_PERC_JURO,
        A.VL_OUTRAS_DESPESAS AS VL_OUTROS_IMP,
        0 AS NR_REMESSA,
        EM.NM_RAZAO_SOCIAL MARCA,
        E.NM_FANTASIA_ESTAB AS DS_UNIDADE,
        E.CD_CGC AS CNPJ,
'TASY Delphi' AS BASE,
 SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
FROM    TITULO_RECEBER A, 
        PESSOA_JURIDICA B,
        ESTABELECIMENTO E,
        EMPRESA EM,
        CONVENIO C
where   b.cd_cgc = a.cd_cgc
AND     a.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
AND     E.CD_EMPRESA = EM.CD_EMPRESA
AND     B.CD_CGC = C.CD_CGC
AND     C.DT_CANCELAMENTO IS NULL

WHERE E.CD_CONVENIO = C.CD_CONVENIO

     gcc,
     str,
     emp
where gcc.gcc_str_cod = str_cod
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod
and emp_cgc <> '-'
and cnv_cod <> '999'
and cnv_stat = 'A'

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select 

'HTML5' as BASE,
'' as cd_marca,
'' as marca,
'' as cd_estabelecimento,
p.nr_atendimento,
p.nr_atendimento as nr_registro_unico,
p.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,
p.nr_interno_conta,
obter_nome_estab(c.cd_estabelecimento) as ds_estabelecimento,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,
pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
pf.ie_sexo,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CEP') as nr_cep,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CI') as ds_cidade,
obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
p.cd_convenio as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
p.cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(p.cd_medico_executor) as ds_medico_executor,
p.cd_medico_req as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(p.cd_medico_req) as ds_medico_requisitante,
p.ie_origem_proced,
p.cd_procedimento,
obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced) as ds_procedimento, 
obter_valor_dominio(19,pr.ie_classificacao) as ds_classificacao,
'' as ds_classif_procedimento,
0 as cd_proced_principal,
'' ds_proced_principal,
p.qt_procedimento,
c.vl_conta,
p.vl_procedimento,
c.ie_status_acerto,
decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,
'' as cd_tuss,
'' as ds_classif_lio
from procedimento_paciente p,
atendimento_paciente at,
pessoa_fisica pf,
procedimento pr,
conta_paciente c
where p.nr_atendimento = at.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and p.cd_procedimento = pr.cd_procedimento
and p.ie_origem_proced = pr.ie_origem_proced
and p.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta
and p.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
and c.ie_cancelamento is null
and at.dt_entrada between sysdate - 1 and sysdate

select 

'HTML5' as BASE,
'' as cd_marca,
'' as marca,
'' as cd_estabelecimento,
p.nr_atendimento,
'' as nr_registro_unico,
p.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,
p.nr_interno_conta,
obter_nome_estab(c.cd_estabelecimento) as ds_estabelecimento,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,
pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
pf.ie_sexo,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CEP') as nr_cep,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CI') as ds_cidade,
obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
p.cd_convenio as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao as cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao) as ds_medico_executor,
ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao) as ds_medico_requisitante,
'' as ie_origem_proced,
p.cd_material as cd_procedimento,
pr.ds_material as ds_procedimento, 
'Material' as ds_classificacao,
'' as ds_classif_procedimento,
0 as cd_proced_principal,
'' ds_proced_principal,
p.qt_material as qt_procedimento,
c.vl_conta,
p.vl_material as vl_procedimento,
c.ie_status_acerto,
decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,
0 as cd_tuss,
'' as ds_classif_lio
from material_atend_paciente p,
atendimento_paciente at,
pessoa_fisica pf,
material pr,
conta_paciente c,
cirurgia ci
where p.nr_atendimento = at.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and p.cd_material = pr.cd_material
and p.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta
and p.nr_cirurgia = ci.nr_cirurgia
and p.nr_atendimento = ci.nr_atendimento
and p.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
and c.ie_cancelamento is null
and at.dt_entrada between sysdate - 2 and sysdate - 1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH db as (
    select 
        top 5
        'Smart HOSL' as BASE
        ,3 as CD_MARCA
        ,'DAYHORC' as DS_MARCA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) AS NS_REGISTRO_UNICO --duvida
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,smm_num as NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 7
            when '9' then 7
            when '13' then 7
            when 'SCL' then 7
            when '901' then 7
            when 'IOF' then 7
            when '13' then 8
            when 'DHI' then 9
        end as CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 'HBA'
            when '9' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'HBA'
            when 'SCL' then 'HBA'
            when '901' then 'HBA'
            when 'IOF' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'Itaigara'
            when 'DHI' then 'Itabuna'
        end as DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as IE_STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
        ,'' DS_CLASSIF_LIO
        ,smm_sfat
        ,smm_pacote
        ,smm_num_pai
        ,smm_p_osm_serie
        ,smm_p_osm_num
        ,smm_p_smm_num
        ,smm_hsp_num
        ,smm_rci_serie
        ,smm_rci_num
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (
            smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
            and smm_osm = osm_num
        )
        inner join str str_osm on (
            str_osm.str_cod = osm_str
        )
        inner join str str_emp on (
            str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod
        )
        inner join pac on (
            pac_reg = osm_pac
        )
        inner join cnv on (
            cnv_cod = osm_cnv
        )
        inner join psv psv_exe on (
            psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join psv psv_req on (
            psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join smk on (
            smk_cod = smm_cod
            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod
        )
        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

select 
    BASE
    ,CD_MARCA
    ,DS_MARCA
    ,NS_REGISTRO_UNICO
    ,DT_ATUALIZACAO
    ,DT_ENTRADA
    ,NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,DT_NASCIMENTO
    ,NR_CPF
    ,IE_SEXO
    ,NR_CEP
    ,DS_CIDADE
    ,DS_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,CD_CONVENIO
    ,DS_CONVENIO
    ,CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
    ,DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
    ,IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,case 
        when smm_num_pai is null then DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    else (select    
            CD_PROCEDIMENTO 
        from 
            db tmp 
        where 
            tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
            and db.smm_num_pai = tmp.NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ) end as CD_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINCIPAL
    ,case 
        when smm_num_pai is null then DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    else (select 
            DS_PROCEDIMENTO 
        from 
            db tmp 
        where 
            tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
            and db.smm_num_pai = tmp.NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ) end as DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINCIPAL
    ,QT_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,(select 
        sum(VL_PROCEDIMENTO) 
    from 
        db tmp 
    where 
        tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
        and (smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
        and smm_sfat not in ('C')
    ) AS VL_CONTA 
    ,VL_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,IE_STATUS_ACERTO
    ,IE_STATUS_CONTA
    ,CD_TUSS
    ,DS_CLASSIF_LIO
    -- ,smm_rci_serie
    -- ,smm_rci_num
    -- ,smm_p_osm_serie
    -- ,smm_p_osm_num
from 
    db
where
    1 = 1
    and VL_PROCEDIMENTO <> 0
    and (smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and smm_sfat not in ('C')

            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod

        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

WITH db as (
    select 
        TOP 5
        'Smart INOB' as BASE
        ,3 as CD_MARCA
        ,'DAYHORC' as DS_MARCA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) AS NS_REGISTRO_UNICO --duvida
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,smm_num as NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 7
            when '9' then 7
            when '13' then 7
            when 'SCL' then 7
            when '901' then 7
            when 'IOF' then 7
            when '13' then 8
            when 'DHI' then 9
        end as CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 'HBA'
            when '9' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'HBA'
            when 'SCL' then 'HBA'
            when '901' then 'HBA'
            when 'IOF' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'Itaigara'
            when 'DHI' then 'Itabuna'
        end as DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as IE_STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
        ,'' DS_CLASSIF_LIO
        ,smm_sfat
        ,smm_pacote
        ,smm_num_pai
        ,smm_p_osm_serie
        ,smm_p_osm_num
        ,smm_p_smm_num
        ,smm_hsp_num
        ,smm_rci_serie
        ,smm_rci_num
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (
            smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
            and smm_osm = osm_num
        )
        inner join str str_osm on (
            str_osm.str_cod = osm_str
        )
        inner join str str_emp on (
            str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod
        )
        inner join pac on (
            pac_reg = osm_pac
        )
        inner join cnv on (
            cnv_cod = osm_cnv
        )
        inner join psv psv_exe on (
            psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join psv psv_req on (
            psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join smk on (
            smk_cod = smm_cod
            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod
        )
        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select

'Tasy Sadalla' as BASE,
--x.nr_seq_proc_pacote,
7 as cd_marca,
'Hospital de Olhos Sadalla Amin Ghanem' as marca,
17 as cd_estabelecimento,
c.nr_atendimento,
'7'||'17'||c.nr_atendimento as nr_registro_unico,
x.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,
c.nr_interno_conta,
null as ds_estabelecimento,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,

pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
pf.ie_sexo,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CEP') as nr_cep,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CI') as ds_cidade,
--pf.cd_pessoa_fisica as cd_pessoa_fisica,
obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
c.cd_convenio_parametro as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
x.cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(x.cd_medico_executor) as ds_medico_executor,
x.cd_medico_req as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(x.cd_medico_req) as ds_medico_requisitante,
x.ie_origem_proced,
x.cd_procedimento,
x.ds_procedimento as ds_procedimento,
x.classif as ds_classificacao,

(select r.ds_grupo_receita from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) as ds_classif_procedimento,

case
when (select r.nr_sequencia from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) = 12 then x.cd_procedimento
else

(select z.cd_procedimento as valor 
 from procedimento_paciente z 
 where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
 and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
 --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
 and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                          from procedimento_paciente w 
                          where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                          and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                          and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                          ) 
 group by z.cd_procedimento) end cd_proced_principal,

case
when (select r.nr_sequencia from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) = 12 then obter_desc_procedimento(x.cd_procedimento, x.ie_origem_proced)
else

obter_desc_procedimento(

(select z.cd_procedimento as valor 
   from procedimento_paciente z 
   where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
   and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
   --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
    and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                            from procedimento_paciente w 
                            where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                            and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                            and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                            ) 
                            group by z.cd_procedimento),

(select min(z.ie_origem_proced) as ie_origem_proced 
   from procedimento_paciente z 
   where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
   and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
   --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
    and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                         from procedimento_paciente w 
                         where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                         and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                         and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                         ) 
 group by z.ie_origem_proced)

)end ds_proced_principal,

x.qt_procedimento,
c.vl_conta,
x.vl_procedimento,
c.ie_status_acerto,
decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,
x.tuss as cd_tuss,
(select x.ds_estrutura from  mat_estrutura x, mat_estrutura_cadastro y where x.nr_sequencia = y.nr_seq_estrutura and y.cd_material = x.cd_procedimento) as ds_classif_lio
from atendimento_paciente at,
conta_paciente c,
pessoa_fisica pf,

(select p.nr_interno_conta, 
p.cd_procedimento, 
obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced) as ds_procedimento, 
obter_valor_dominio(19,pr.ie_classificacao) as classif,
p.cd_medico_executor,
p.cd_medico_req,
p.ie_origem_proced,
p.qt_procedimento,
p.vl_procedimento,
p.vl_medico,
p.nr_sequencia,
p.cd_edicao_amb,
p.cd_convenio,
p.nr_atendimento,
p.cd_motivo_exc_conta,
p.nr_seq_proc_crit_repasse,
obter_codigo_tuss(p.nr_seq_proc_interno) as tuss,
p.dt_atualizacao,
pr.nr_seq_grupo_rec
from procedimento_paciente p,
     procedimento pr
where p.cd_procedimento = pr.cd_procedimento
and p.ie_origem_proced = pr.ie_origem_proced

union all
select mp.nr_interno_conta, 
mp.cd_material as cd_procedimento, 
m.ds_material as ds_procedimento,
obter_dados_material(m.cd_material,'GRU') as classif,
obter_medico_resp_atend(mp.nr_atendimento,'C') as cd_medico_executor,
obter_medico_resp_atend(mp.nr_atendimento,'C') as cd_medico_req,
0 as ie_origem_proced,
mp.qt_material,
mp.vl_material,
0 vl_medico,
mp.nr_sequencia,
'0' as cd_edicao_amb,
mp.cd_convenio,
mp.nr_atendimento,
mp.cd_motivo_exc_conta,
0 nr_seq_proc_crit_repasse,
0 tuss,
mp.dt_atualizacao,
0 nr_seq_grupo_rec
from material_atend_paciente mp,
     material m
where mp.cd_material = m.cd_material) x

where at.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento
and c.nr_interno_conta = x.nr_interno_conta
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and c.ie_cancelamento is null
and x.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
and c.cd_estabelecimento = 1
and at.dt_entrada BETWEEN sysdate -2 and sysdate
and c.vl_conta > 0
and ROWNUM <=5
group by 
c.nr_atendimento,
at.dt_entrada,
c.nr_interno_conta,
c.cd_estabelecimento,
at.cd_pessoa_fisica,
c.cd_convenio_parametro,
c.vl_conta,
x.nr_sequencia,
x.vl_medico,
x.vl_procedimento,
x.ie_origem_proced,
x.cd_procedimento,
x.ds_procedimento,

emp_cgc AS CNPJ,

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
CONCAT('ALTER INDEX  ', A.index_name , ' ON ' ,a.schema_nm , '.' , A.table_nm, ' DISABLE ') as DISABLE_INDEX , 
CONCAT('ALTER INDEX  ', A.index_name  , ' ON ' ,a.schema_nm , '.' , A.table_nm, ' REBUILD ') as REBUILD_INDEX ,
A.index_name ,a.schema_nm + '.' + A.table_nm as tb
FROM index_aj_dw A
INNER JOIN ADF.ctr_origem_destino B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.TABLE_NM = B.NOME_TABELA_DESTINO
INNER JOIN ADF.CTR_REPROCESSA_DW C WITH(NOLOCK) ON C.NOME_SCHEMA = A.SCHEMA_NM AND C.NOME_TABELA = A.TABLE_NM
WHERE C.IE_ATIVA = 'S'

SELECT  
    B.NOME_KEYVAULT_SECRET
    ,B.NOME_SCHEMA_ORIGEM
    ,B.NOME_TABELA_ORIGEM
    ,A.NOME_SCHEMA AS NOME_SCHEMA_DESTINO
    ,A.NOME_TABELA AS NOME_TABELA_DESTINO
    ,CASE
        WHEN B.NOME_KEYVAULT_SECRET <> 'SadallaTasy' THEN 'COMPLETA'
        ELSE A.TIPO_CARGA
    END TIPO_CARGA    
    ,A.NOME_COLUNA
FROM adf.ctr_reprocessa_dw A WITH(NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN adf.ctr_origem_destino B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.NOME_PLATAFORMA = B.NOME_PLATAFORMA AND UPPER(A.NOME_TABELA) = 'TBL_'+UPPER(REPLACE(REPLACE(UPPER(B.NOME_TABELA_ORIGEM),'VW_',''),'_V2',''))
WHERE A.IE_ATIVA = 'S'
 AND B.REPROCESSAR = 'S'

SELECT 
CONCAT('ALTER INDEX  ', A.index_name , ' ON ' ,a.schema_nm , '.' , A.table_nm, ' DISABLE ') as DISABLE_INDEX , 
CONCAT('ALTER INDEX  ', A.index_name  , ' ON ' ,a.schema_nm , '.' , A.table_nm, ' REBUILD ') as REBUILD_INDEX ,
A.index_name ,a.schema_nm + '.' + A.table_nm as tb
FROM index_aj_dw A
INNER JOIN ADF.ctr_origem_destino B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.TABLE_NM = B.NOME_TABELA_DESTINO
INNER JOIN ADF.CTR_REPROCESSA_DW C WITH(NOLOCK) ON C.NOME_SCHEMA = A.SCHEMA_NM AND C.NOME_TABELA = A.TABLE_NM
WHERE C.IE_ATIVA = 'S'
