source.sqlReaderQuery:
with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = SUBSTRING(cast(CAST(getdate() AS DATE) as varchar(10)),1,7)
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))

SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai

    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA

    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = @PERIODO
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL

DECLARE @PERIODO AS VARCHAR(7)

SELECT
    @PERIODO = SUBSTRING(cast(CAST(getdate()-1 AS DATE) as varchar(10)),1,7)

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = @PERIODO
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL
SELECT cast(day(GETDATE()) as varchar(2)) as day

source.oracleReaderQuery:
WITH FILTRO_CIR AS(
/*FILTRO DE PROCEDIMENTO QUE CLASSIFICA O PROGRAMA CARE*/
SELECT DISTINCT
    P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,'Cirurgia' as grupo_proc
FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
WHERE UPPER(P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO) LIKE '%ANTIANGIO%'   OR UPPER(P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO) LIKE '%INTRAVITREA%'

)
, FITLRO_CONS_EX AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,CASE
            WHEN P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO IN (10014,10101012) THEN 'Consultas'
                ELSE 'Exames'
             END grupo_proc
         ,p.ds_procedimento    
        --,decode(upper(GP.ds_grupo_proc),'CONSULTAS',GP.DS_GRUPO_PROC,'Exames') grupo_proc
    FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
    --INNER JOIN grupo_proc GP ON gp.cd_grupo_proc = p.cd_grupo_proc
    WHERE P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO IN (10014
                                ,10101012
                                ,41501144
                                ,41301315
                                ,41301013
                                ,50010093
                                ,41301250
                                ,41301420
                                ,50010131
                                ,50010123
    )
    AND UPPER(p.ie_situacao) = 'A'

)

,PROC AS (
    SELECT
        a.cd_procedimento
        ,a.grupo_proc
    FROM FILTRO_CIR A
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT
        a.cd_procedimento
        ,a.grupo_proc
    FROM FITLRO_CONS_EX A
    
)

, PAC_CARE AS(
SELECT DISTINCT
    AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
FROM PROCEDIMENTO_PACIENTE PP
INNER JOIN ATENDIMENTO_PACIENTE AP ON AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
INNER JOIN FILTRO_CIR F ON F.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO

)

SELECT 
    1 as ID_SYS
    ,EMP.CD_EMPRESA
    ,EMP.DS_NOME_CURTO      AS SHORT_EMPRESA
    ,ESTAB.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,ESTAB.NM_FANTASIA_ESTAB
    ,AP.IE_TIPO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,PF.NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,DIAG.CD_DOENCA
    ,DIAG.DS_DOENCA_CID
    ,y.grupo_proc
    ,PP.CD_CONVENIO
    ,PP.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,MED.NM_GUERRA  as NM_MEDICO
    ,MED.IE_CORPO_CLINICO
    ,TRUNC(AP.DT_ENTRADA)     AS DT_ENTRADA
    ,TRUNC(PP.DT_PROCEDIMENTO) AS DT_PROCEDIMENTO 
    ,PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,PP.QT_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,PP.VL_PROCEDIMENTO
FROM PROCEDIMENTO_PACIENTE PP
INNER JOIN ATENDIMENTO_PACIENTE AP ON AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
INNER JOIN PAC_CARE X ON X.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
INNER JOIN PESSOA_FISICA PF ON PF.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
INNER JOIN PROC Y   ON Y.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
INNER JOIN ESTABELECIMENTO ESTAB ON ESTAB.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = AP.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
INNER JOIN MEDICO MED ON MED.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = PP.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
INNER JOIN EMPRESA EMP ON EMP.CD_EMPRESA = ESTAB.CD_EMPRESA

OUTER APPLY(
    SELECT
        P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
    WHERE P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO AND ROWNUM = 1
)P

OUTER APPLY(
    SELECT
        TMP.*
    FROM(    
        SELECT 
            DD.NR_ATENDIMENTO
            ,DD.CD_DOENCA
            ,CD.DS_DOENCA_CID
            ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DD.NR_ATENDIMENTO ORDER BY DD.DT_ATUALIZACAO desc) ID_LINHA
        FROM diagnostico_doenca DD
        LEFT JOIN CID_DOENCA CD ON CD.CD_DOENCA_CID = DD.CD_DOENCA
        WHERE DD.IE_CLASSIFICACAO_DOENCA = 'P'
    )TMP
    WHERE TMP.ID_LINHA = 1
        AND TMP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO

)DIAG

WHERE AP.IE_TIPO_ATENDIMENTO <> 3
        AND AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA <> 346

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select pf.cd_pessoa_fisica, pf.nm_pessoa_fisica, 
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dt_entrada,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_entrada, 

fast_ops.obter_nome_pf(at.cd_medico_resp) as nm_medico, c.cd_convenio, fast_ops.obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio) AS ds_convenio, 
at.nr_atendimento,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,

at.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,

to_char(at.dt_entrada,'dd') dia,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'mm') mes,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'yyyy') ano,
to_char(at.dt_cancelamento, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_cancelamento,
to_char(at.dt_atualizacao, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_atualizacao,
'Tasy HTML' as BASE

from 
fast_ops.atendimento_paciente at, 
fast_ops.pessoa_fisica pf,
fast_ops.atend_categoria_convenio c,
fast_ops.procedencia p,
fast_ops.estabelecimento e,
fast_ops.empresa em
where at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and at.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia (+)
and at.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

AND at.dt_entrada between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- Consulta HOB - Azure

select o.nr_sequencia as nr_sequencia, 
to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dt_atualizacao,
to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_atualizacao, 
o.nr_atendimento, 
o.cd_medico as cd_medico ,
fast_ops.obter_nome_pf(o.cd_medico) as nm_medico, 
c.qt_periodo||' '||c.ie_periodo as ds_retorno,  
substr(z.conduta,1,1000) as ds_conduta,
fast_ops.obter_pessoa_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento, 'C') as cd_pessoa_fisica,

(select unique d.cd_doenca ||' - '|| a.ds_doenca_cid
from fast_ops.diagnostico_doenca d, 
     fast_ops.cid_doenca a
where a.cd_doenca_cid = d.cd_doenca
and d.nr_atendimento = o.nr_atendimento
and d.nr_seq_interno = (select max(x.nr_seq_interno) from fast_ops.diagnostico_doenca x where x.nr_atendimento = d.nr_atendimento)) as ds_diagnostico,

fast_ops.obter_nome_estab(fast_ops.obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento)) as DS_UNIDADE,

e.cd_cgc as cnpj,

'HOB' as MARCA,
'Tasy HTML' as BASE

from fast_ops.oft_consulta o,
     (SELECT a.nr_seq_consulta, b.ds_resultado as conduta
      FROM   fast_ops.med_avaliacao_paciente a 
      inner join fast_ops.med_avaliacao_result b ON b.nr_seq_avaliacao = a.nr_sequencia 
      WHERE  a.nr_seq_tipo_avaliacao = 34 
      and  b.nr_seq_item = 457 --456, 458 ) 
      GROUP  BY a.nr_seq_consulta, b.ds_resultado) z,
      fast_ops.oft_conduta c,
      fast_ops.estabelecimento e
where o.nr_sequencia = z.nr_seq_consulta
and o.nr_sequencia = c.nr_seq_consulta
and o.nr_atendimento is not null
and fast_ops.obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento) = e.cd_estabelecimento

and o.dt_atualizacao between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- AGENDAMENTO HOB - Azure

select  a.cd_pessoa_fisica, 
a.cd_convenio, 
fast_ops.obter_cnpj_estabelecimento(ag.cd_estabelecimento) as cnpj,
to_char((a.hr_inicio) , 'yyyy-mm-dd') as data_agenda,
to_char((a.hr_inicio) , 'hh24:mi:ss') as hora_agenda,
'Consulta' as tipo_agenda,
pf.nm_pessoa_fisica as nm_paciente,
substr(fast_ops.obter_desc_procedimento(a.cd_procedimento, a.ie_origem_proced),1,1000) as ds_procedimento_princ,
substr((select Listagg(fast_ops.Obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced), ' ;') within GROUP (ORDER BY fast_ops.Obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced))  from FAST_OPS.AGENDA_PACIENTE_PROC p where p.nr_sequencia = a.nr_sequencia),1,1000) as ds_procedimento_adic,
1 + (select count(1)from FAST_OPS.AGENDA_PACIENTE_PROC p where p.nr_sequencia = a.nr_sequencia) as ie_quantidade,
fast_ops.obter_nome_usuario(a.nm_usuario_orig) as nm_usuario,
fast_ops.obter_nome_pf(a.cd_medico_exec) as nm_medico,
e.nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,
fast_ops.obter_valor_dominio(83,a.ie_status_agenda) as status_agenda,
a.nr_atendimento,
a.nr_sequencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,
a.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
to_char(a.dt_agendamento, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_agendamento,

to_char(a.dt_agenda,'dd') dia,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'mm') mes,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'yyyy') ano,
ac.ds_classificacao,
aa.ds_agrupamento ds_agrupamento,
a.cd_motivo_cancelamento,
substr(fast_ops.obter_ds_motivo_status(a.nr_sequencia, a.cd_agenda),1,200) as ds_motivo_cancelamento,
a.cd_agenda,
to_char(a.dt_atualizacao, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_atualizacao,
'Tasy HTML' as BASE

from FAST_OPS.agenda_paciente a,
     FAST_OPS.agenda ag,
     FAST_OPS.pessoa_fisica pf,
     FAST_OPS.procedencia p,
     FAST_OPS.agenda_paciente_classif ac,
     FAST_OPS.agrupamento_agenda aa,
     FAST_OPS.empresa em,
     FAST_OPS.estabelecimento e
where a.cd_agenda = ag.cd_agenda
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica (+)
and a.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia (+)
and a.nr_seq_classif_agenda = ac.nr_sequencia (+)
and ag.nr_seq_agrupamento = aa.nr_sequencia (+)
and ag.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica is not null
and ag.cd_pessoa_fisica is not null
and ag.cd_tipo_agenda = 2

and a.dt_agendamento between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

select u.nm_usuario, 
u.ds_usuario, 
u.ie_situacao, 
to_char(u.dt_atualizacao, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_atualizacao,
fast_ops.obter_nome_estabelecimento(u.cd_estabelecimento) as DS_UNIDADE,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
fast_ops.obter_nome_empresa(fast_ops.obter_empresa_estab(u.cd_estabelecimento)) as Marca,
'Tasy HTML' as BASE
from FAST_OPS.usuario u,
     FAST_OPS.empresa em,
     FAST_OPS.estabelecimento e
where u.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

SELECT A.CD_AGENDA, A.DS_AGENDA, A.CD_TIPO_AGENDA, A.CD_PESSOA_FISICA, E.CD_CGC as CNPJ, (SELECT X.DS_AREA_ATUACAO FROM fast_ops.AREA_ATUACAO_MEDICA X
WHERE X.NR_SEQUENCIA = A.NR_SEQ_AREA_ATUACAO) AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO, A.IE_SITUACAO,
to_char(A.DT_ATUALIZACAO, 'yyyy-mm-dd') DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'Tasy HTML' as BASE
FROM FAST_OPS.AGENDA A,
     FAST_OPS.ESTABELECIMENTO E
WHERE A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO,
'Smart Oftalmoclin' as BASE
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA,
'Smart Oftalmoclin' as BASE
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'OFTALMOCLIN Hospital de Olhos da Bahia' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'14307763000194' as CNPJ,
'OFTALMOCLIN' as MARCA,
'Smart Oftalmoclin' as BASE
from usr

SELECT
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'OFTALMOCLIN Hospital de Olhos da Bahia' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'14307763000194' as CNPJ,
'IOF' AS MARCA,
'Smart Oftalmoclin' as BASE
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO,
'Smart Oftalmoclin' as BASE
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod
